text: "Hello World" is a 1999 song by Belgian singer Belle Perez and is the title track from her debut studio album Hello World. It went to number 84 in the Netherlands, number 42 in New Zealand, number 31 in Italy and number 56 in Belgium. ==Track listings== ;CD-Single (Antler / Subway 7243 887250 2) # "Hello World" - 3:05 # "Hello World (Accoustic Version)" - 3:05 ;CD-Maxi (Antler / Subway 7243 8 88457 2 4 (EMI) / EAN 0724388845724) # "Hello World (Original Mix)" - 3:05 # "Hello World (Nordic Radio Mix)" - 3:36 # "Hello World (E-Lite Radio Mix)" - 3:36 # "Hello World (Roy Malone Lord Radio Mix)" - 3:11 # "Hello World [Spanish]" - 3:18 ==References== Category:1999 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Pop songs
title: Hello World (Belle Perez song)
